title: Compelled to Serve: K Diaries Trilogy
description: You know what the worst day of my life?It wasn’t the day when I lost my mom, or when I was abandoned by my own father, but it was the day when I was sold to a man.People often are unhappy due to a shortage of wealth and love but for me?I don’t even have freedom, my will, my independence. Yes, I am being owned and I lost it all the day I was sold to my master. Now the only thing left in my life is to obey, to follow commands and I am bond to do it, and the times I care about anything other than my master, I get punished.Here is my story of how I turned my beautiful life into a living hell. How I got myself into a slave’s life, just for the sake of a few hundred dollars.
author: S.M. Kira
